timeline.message: [JBPM-8896] NPE during Process Migration when Boundary Timer is fired but UserTask not completed

timeline.bodyText:
Is the casting to DefaultTimerJobInstance needed? For example, replacing defaultTimerInstance in the next line by
((DefaultJobHandle) timerInstance.getJobHandle()).getTimerJobInstance()
you wouldn't need this variable.

replies.bodyText: yes it is needed JobHandle does not have method getTimerJobInstance
